DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to quantify the relative contribution of variables obtained during a physical fitness evaluation and a short screening questionnaire in determining the short-term and long term risk of persistent disabling low back pain in patients with chronic low back pain. It has been hypothesized that patients with higher physical fitness will present a lower risk of persistent disabling low back pain and so, a lower score on the questionnaire.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Factors of Disabling Low Back Pain in Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain
